text: John Smith works at Google as a senior engineer. He reports to Mary Johnson, who is the VP of Engineering.
Dr. Sarah Chen published a paper with Professor James Wilson at MIT. Their research was funded by the National Science Foundation.
Apple acquired the startup founded by Michael Brown. Tim Cook announced the deal at the conference in San Francisco.
Senator Elizabeth Warren met with President Biden at the White House to discuss the new healthcare bill.
Amazon's CEO Andy Jassy praised the work done by the Seattle team. The company plans to expand its operations in New York.
Dr. Lisa Park and Dr. Robert Kim co-authored a study at Stanford University. The research was featured in Nature journal.
Microsoft's Satya Nadella spoke at the conference organized by TechCrunch. Bill Gates was also in attendance.
The merger between Disney and Fox was approved by CEO Bob Iger. The deal affects thousands of employees in Los Angeles.
Professor Emily Davis supervises PhD student Alex Thompson at Harvard. Their lab focuses on machine learning applications.
Twitter's former CEO Jack Dorsey invested in the fintech startup founded by Rachel Green. The company is based in Austin.
